website_summaries.verdict: A cheaper exercise ball that provides good stability and is unlikely to pop.
pros: This high-quality, scent-free ball will keep its shape
Far less likely to pop than its competitors
Comes in five colors and multiple sizes

customer_reviews.title: Birthing Ball!!! Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball exclusively as a birthing ball. I used it at home to sit on while at the table or even just watching TV. I could sit longer without my lower back hurting, and in the 3rd trimester I would kneel on the floor and lay my head on the ball. This helped take the pressure of my back and also helps the baby fall into the right position for birth (from what I've read). When you do get it.. be ready for an arm workout as the pump is manual and takes a little while to pump up.. my husband and i took turns!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied, no plastic smell, durable and so much fun! Way better for your back than a chair!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! LOVE this ball. It's eco friendly and doesn't have the awful plastic smell like so many other exercise balls. It's also really strong, durable and non-sticky! I bought two, one for me size 65" (I'm 5'4") and one for my hubby size 75" (he's 6'2"), they are a great size and we use them as desk chairs, exercise equipment and fun rough housing toys to play with our kids with!!! I would recommend these SmarterLife balls to anyone who is looking for an environmentally friendly, extremely strong and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Danika Bueno

customer_reviews.title: ... that Amazon would permit a product to be sold like this one
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that Amazon would permit a product to be sold like this one. It arrived with the ball stuck together, there were no instructions nor the exercise chart in the box, only the melted together ball and pump there was a stopper already in the ball. This had been used and thrown back in the box minus anything but the ball and pump. Worst purchase I have ever had from Amazon. Luckily I have had more successes! No reply from the company.
customer_reviews.author: C Volk

customer_reviews.title: Not Up To The Advertised Standard
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this exercise ball based on the advertisement that it could be used for a birthing ball. The ball was supposed to fill the black ribbon seen on the photo, but as you can see, it comes nowhere close. The pump with it literally cannot put anymore air in it. Unless we can find a heavy duty pump AND the ball does not burst, I think we will be returning this disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: no overpacking and it looks/feels/works great. My co-worker has a similar ball but her ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, everything as expected, no overpacking and it looks/feels/works great. My co-worker has a similar ball but her pump was much smaller, so she borrowed mine to inflate hers much more quickly. My only complaint so far is that I leaned it against a wall at work and it tore of the paint and stuck to my ball. So BEWARE and not let it touch painted surfaces! :O(
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Jorgan

customer_reviews.title: The ball is good quality and looks heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The ball is good quality and looks heavy duty. The issue I have is quality control. The exercise pamphlet included is for a foam roller. Would be nice to have the proper brochure. The measuring tape is a flimsy black plastic with no markings on it. I assume it's the measuring tape but who knows what it's for as there are no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gurinder S

customer_reviews.title: Does not get to the size that is stated and is very difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball to use at the end of my pregnancy. I am 5’11” so I ordered the larger size ball for my height. When inflating the ball it was impossible to inflate completely. The pump would literally get stuck and stop inflating. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerMel

customer_reviews.title: Helps my lower back from desk work.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of herniated disks and have to work at a computer most days. My pain management doctor and physical therapist recommended that I ditch the office chair and get a ball instead. I have absolutely no complaints about this ball and regret that I didn't buy it sooner. The ball is easy to inflate and sturdy. The height is perfect for working at my desk (I'm 5' 5"). I felt an immediate difference in my lower back. I highly recommend this to anyone who sits for long periods of time and/or has back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for expectant moms!
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 weeks pregnant and I ordered this to sit on/bounce on to relieve some of the pain in my hips. It’s exactly what I was expecting! Easy to inflate and durable. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: Great option for work desk
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I read reviews halfway through inflating, because it seems there is no way it could stretch as far as the tape says. But it does - trust the tape! I am 5’3” and I ordered the 65 as recommended by other users, but it feels a little large for sitting at my desk and I do wish I had order a size smaller. The pump that comes with it was useless which is the only reason I gave it 4 stars; I ended up using a foot pump I had at home because the hand pump it came with kept getting jammed. Only minimal smell (I have bought some exercise balls that smell terrible). Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: This ball is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball to assist with physical therapy. It's awesome! I'm no skinny mini and was a little apprehensive about plopping my big butt onto this ball. To my amazement it didn't explode and dump me on the floor, scarring the poop out of my dog! My dog and I are most grateful. My kids thoroughly enjoy fighting over it and throwing it around my living room. Nothing has been broken yet and thankfully my tailbone remains intact. If at any time we do manage to destroy my pretty red ball I'll happily jump on amazon and order again from this wonderful little company.Thank you! :D
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and filled it up exactly per directions and it immediately got two holes!!!! I have duck tape over the holes. Hope it works ! Update: it’s not working and got to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: John & Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be the real deal
customer_reviews.text: This exercise ball is superior to others I have tried in some significant ways. The ball is easy to use, is fully supportive, and does not remove paint from surrounding furniture . . . yet. Yes, I have had that problem with other brands, so am hoping this one stays clean. I found 15 minutes on the ball the first time was plenty, but after a week, I am on for 60 minutes without tiring. I think this is going to be a big help as I continue to recover from knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed in the thickness of the rubber used in this ball. I bought the 65mm. It is as promised and the thoughtful accessories that come with it are a plus. What has finally made me "settle down" with it is the very good customer service from the supplier SmarterLife Products. I thought the ball was too squishy and I only weigh 103 lbs. They advised me how to insure it was fully inflated and that improved the situation. It is larger than I probably need as I am 5'3" but that is my mistake and I think it will work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MariB

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since I'm working at home and the kitchen chairs are not cutting it. I'm 5'11" and am a fat girl. This ball is amazing! I can do some easy stretches on it and it has helped dramatically with my sciatic pain associated with sitting all day while working. I really thought it was going to take forever to pump up with the hand pump, but it was much faster than I anticipated...still took a little while, but not too bad. I also pumped it up more over the following few days as it settled. I love it. My daughter and son also like to play with it and on it. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This ball has changed my life. I was worried I’d pop it when I first got it and was heavier (280 lbs) than I am now. No popping or any other issues. I use it for sitting at my desk 8 hrs a day and it has SAVED MY BACK! Please be patient with the “setup” as you do have to inflate, measure, maybe inflate some more, let rest for 24 hours, measure again and inflate again. I do occasionally inflate it every few weeks (just like a car tire, with use it needs more air). All in all, this is one of the best purchases I’ve made for my physical health.
customer_reviews.author: Neah Winchester Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this ball
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this ball for a number of years now and it’s held up well for a *lot* of bouncing. I first used it at my desk while working, then most recently my husband and I used it constantly with our infant daughter, who was almost instantly soothed by the motion. I followed the advice of reviewers who said to go a size up, rather than following the size chart, and I wish I hadn’t because it’s a bit too big—I’m usually on my tip toes. But I don’t feel off balance so it hasn’t been a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Injured when pumping the ball and doesn't hold shape
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this ball as I'm about to have a baby and plan on using as a birthing ball. I got the 65cms as I'm 5'7" and inflated it to the specifications of the tape attached to the perfect size ( it was so hard to pump - maybe my pump was defective?- that my right shoulder now hurts so much, so instead of alleviating my pregnancy pain, I got a brand new pain in another part of my body - thanks a lot!). The main problem is that when I sit it goes down so much my hips are not above my knees as I should with this ball. Total fiasco.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Working in the Physical Therapy field, I've had to inflate these things fairly often, and this one in particular, along with the pump it comes with, was a breeze. I've seen a few bad reviews about the band that comes with this to show how much to blow it up. Honestly, I didn't use it and just inflated it to how firm I wanted it. Anyway, I'm super happy with this and glad I bought it. Will definitely be recommending it to patients/friends/family when anyone I know needs an exercise ball!
customer_reviews.author: Alei

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size in boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super annoyed. I ordered 4 of these for my classroom over a year ago - 55cm. I ordered two more the other day and what I received was the smallest size in the 55cm box. I’m irritated that I’m having to deal with sending them back because they’re not labeled correctly. They blew up to about 1/2 the size as the black measuring tape that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Martiniolive

customer_reviews.title: Durable & strong ball! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made exercise ball! It is very durable and strong, but the one we got seems to be more of an oval than a circle- but it works well. I like that it includes the pump! I recommend this product, especially for the price. Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 65cm and 75cm for my pregnant wife. Contacted the company because something wasn't right with the 65cm ball. One of the CEOs personally helped us identify the issue which seemed to be a packaging or manufacturing defect. He sent a new 65cm ball which worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measurements way off
customer_reviews.text: It comes with instructions that you need to inflate it to 63 cm/25.5 inches with a tape measure included for making sure you don't over inflate. Well first thing is that if you inflate this to only 63 cm it is half inflated. If you use the measuring tape, which by the way turns out to be 203 cm long, and inflate it completely so it actually is okay to sit on without hitting the floor, you still have loose "measuring tape." Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: SSinAix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product: the way you inflate it matters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after returning a smaller one because I'm tall and average weight. I went online and learned that inflating it over a few days works best because it needs a little time to stretch. The first day, I inflated it as far as I felt it could go. Then I waited 24 hours and inflated it some more and then I did that one more time. That day, I inflated, then sat, then inflated, then sat until it was where I was comfortable. I didn't have any body pain before so I can't speak to that aspect but I do really like it to change up my sitting and standing routines while I work.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic company to buy from
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball at recommendation of my physical therapist to aid in my rehab program for spinal osteoarthritis. 8t really helps to get my legs moving, reduces my leg pain and helps me maintain my leg strength. Oddly it developed a small puncture hole and was flat one morning. I inquired about a repair kit from the manufacturer and they instead replaced my ball at no charge, which was not expected. Customer service and email response is stellar.
customer_reviews.author: JulesE

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for dogs to play with
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my dogs to play with in the yard. It is tough, strong and the dogs love it. I bought the blue ball, because dogs can see that color with clarity. I would recommend this ball for dogs, humans and fun. I also use it as a foot stool. It relieves my chronic pain.
customer_reviews.author: V. Mccabe.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Hard to Inflate
customer_reviews.text: After spending an hour trying to pump it up enough to use it as a sitting ball, i'm returning the product. It takes a lot of effort to put very little air into the ball. The handle of the pump is so small that it rubs your hands raw. Even worse, the pump lets air escape. After reading other reviews that say the ball doesn't hold air well, I have visions of frequent dealings with this awful pump. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, Inflation pump is complete junk
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many yoga balls in my life and the quality of the ball itself is nice, the inflation tape with holes that line up is brilliant so there is no guesswork as long as you trust the tape. The inflation pump stopped working consistently in the first 90 seconds, it's cheaply made with a very skinny tube. Luckily I kept my old pump which was much better quality, else I would have had to send it back which is very annoying for something that is easily avoidable with a little bit of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reeds

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to help lower back pain from sitting at computer. It worked.
customer_reviews.text: Yep, it definitely worked for me. I started to have lower back pain when I began working more on my computer for my job. Also, my kids bounce all over the house with this ball and love to throw it all over, too. It's taken a lot of abuse over the months. Somehow, it survived.
customer_reviews.author: cobada

customer_reviews.title: The duravility of the ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exercise ball the end of Jan and was very pleased. I inflated it according to the directions and used it as my computer chair. This worked well until the ball began getting softer. I pumped it up and discovered that the rubber had stretched so that it became too high for me to sit on. I only weigh 155lbs so I was well within the weight restriction. I have had to get rid of this ball as it has simply stretched too much.
customer_reviews.author: Wolter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good exercise ball. Contact support if you need a new pump.
customer_reviews.text: Update 5/20: The seller shipped a replacement airpump that works well. So I bumped up the score. The excerise ball seems to be pretty good, a friend recommended this purchase. He has two of them. As a frame of reference, he said he had a defective pump on one of his two purchases. Original review: I don't know if this exercise ball is any good yet, but the handpump provided is atrocious. Video proof of how much you have to struggle to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Homesliced

customer_reviews.title: Had a strong plastic odor but it went away in couple of days.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened a box, I smelled the plastic odor and wanted to return the product right away. But I have decided to give it a chance and inflated the ball using the manual pump. The pump looks cheap, but it served its purpose. Anyway, after a day when I was pumping more air, I noticed that odor started going away. So it took about 2 days to get rid of that plastic smell from the ball completely. Now I use it in my everyday exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Misshappen, not round
customer_reviews.text: Filled this ball up using included pump and measuring tape. Wasn't too hard to inflate, but it isn't round -it looks kind of like a misshapen egg. It is not overfilled. I won't be using it - doesn't seem like it would be safe. I'm afraid if I return it, they'll just send it on to the next buyer. I think it will go in the garbage and I'll just be out the money :-(
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 and ordered a 45-centimeter ball for my desk, I followed the intrusions and the ball never got to its full size, (it's a little bigger than a beach ball right now). Even though this ball is way too small for me to use it is good quality and did not feel like it was going to pop. I would recommend this company but not the 45-centimeter ball unless you plan to use it for a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nemec

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: This review is not based on the ball itself since I have not used it. The problem is when I received the box there were pieces missing including the air pump. The air pump was missing, one of the ball plugs and the piece used to remove the plug from the ball. Also, I was expecting the "measuring tape" to actually have numbers on it but it's basically just black tape. Not a huge deal but the picture on Amazon is misleading since it shows numbers. I'm sure the ball itself is great, but unfortunately I can't use it without an air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the measuring tape! It does take time to pump up that big of a ball but follow the instructions and it actually takes 26 hours to fully inflated the ball properly for the right shape. Open & Inflate some, wait two hours, inflate to 80% and then wait 24 hours before fully inflating. I am 35weeks pregnant and did it mostly on my own with a little pumping help from my husband when he saw what I was doing. I’m 5’7” and the 65” works well for me! Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Justinmud

customer_reviews.title: just a so so ball and experience purchasing it.
customer_reviews.text: not what I was expecting. IN order to inflate it to the correct size, it is so hard that I worried it would burst. I still need to test this out. Also, they did not enclose any inflation instructions and the piece of black material that was enclosed, I guess it is to measure to ensure that you have it at 55 cm, no instructions on how to use. I did contact them, they attached the use instructions to an email, but I don't have a color printer, so I was only able to print it out on the black and white printer that I do have. I don't feel I would purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: susan rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I had spine surgery in September of 2018 with one more to go. It takes a long time to recover so the best medicine is of course exercise. Using this ball has by far been the best in relieving my pain! I would recommend this to anyone who suffers from chronic pain or any pain that keeps them from being their best.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Feldstein

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3  year olds home pt time!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I bought the 45 cm ball for my almost 3 year old little girl that has spina bifida in efforts to help her with balance and core weakness issues that she has. Anyways, it was easy to pump up and has been GREAT! My daughter is really into "playing" on it and with it. I always try to make all of her home pt as much fun as possible but lately shes been growing bored of my obstacle courses etc. Im really pleased that this one inexpensive excercise ball has brought her interest back !!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfSBWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a gym membership
customer_reviews.text: I checked out several of these balls and read some of the reviews, I chose this one because of the standards that were put on the manufacturer. The ball itself is great. It is holding the air at the correct psi, and I have been using it for a few weeks now. It took a bit of pumping to get it up to its fullest. The pump is junk! It kept on blowing apart, and leaked some kind of oil all over my hands. All in all, decent price for what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: R King

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Ball!
customer_reviews.text: My son started PT and the therapist suggested buying an exercise ball for home use. The SmartLife Exercise Ball is sturdy and the directions to inflate the ball were easy to follow. It did take a some time to inflate using the pump provided. Fortunately, though, I had an electric bicycle pump that I used, and it made it much easier and quicker to inflate. I do plan to purchase another larger ball. And I would definitely recommend this company to others.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great new computer chair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this ball. Follow the sizing chart. I thought I could get away with the 45cm because I’m 5’3” and my desk is really low but it is *really* small. I kept it because it is a great exercise ball still and I use it for other purposes. For me the 55 ball was a good size. They seem like they have pretty good customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought like the other reviewers it was the wrong size but you have to keep pumping the ball up even though it feels like no more air can go in the ball. This ball is slightly too big for being 5'3" but bought it as I didn't want to buy two different sizes. Will probably end up buying the small as l l.jer 45" ball down the road.
customer_reviews.author: JustRespiratory

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise ball, handpump a bit tricky though
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the quality of the exercise ball. It's durable and works well for our needs. Thr pump that came with it was a bit difficult to use to inflate the ball, however. Using a hand pump takes a lot of time and unfortunately the one included often let out a lot of air while inflating. We are glad that a pump was included as we did not have one at all. However, the inflating might be difficult for some. For those who are considering buying the fitness orb, if you have any physical limitations such as arthritis or something that might make manual installation difficult, maybe instead use an electric pump if you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Ball works great with bridges, squats, etc. Required during PT exercises. However, the 65 cm is too big for a petite woman a 55 cm would be perfect. Also it was a little hard to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...doesn't pop...not high enough to be a desk chair.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite gym quality, but good quality product that doesn't pop. This is a decent size to sit on, but it's not high enough for something like a desk chair. It's a good size for doing situps if you're an average height guy. If you do plan to use it as a desk chair, you'll need to put it on top of something like a thick book or ream of paper so it's not large enough for that purpose. I'm 5' 9" and it's about five inches too low to be a desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rek101

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and Broken
customer_reviews.text: Has a very strong odor to it like nail polish remover. I really hope the smell goes away. It is about 5 cm smaller than advertised and is slightly sticky to the touch. Also the air pump that was included in the box was broken. Fortunately, I had another pump around. Not really very pleased with the ball but it will work as a temporary solution. The balls sold at Academy are better quality and about the same price wish I would have gone back there.
customer_reviews.author: devon

customer_reviews.title: Missing Correct Exercise Instructions Guide
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. It does come with a hand pump however it is easier to use an electric pump or you will be pumping for days. I was highly disappointed that it was suppose to come with "Exclusive Exercise Instruction guide" however it came witch a guide for the foam roller Ana not the premium exercise ball. A total fail on packaging. The ball is similar to the one in Physical a Therapy which costs $55 compared to $18 for this ball. Little difference. I do want SmarterLife Products to send me the exercise guide which is suppose to come with the guide.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine person

customer_reviews.title: Not just for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Not just a yoga ball but also great for baby bouncing. We are new parents and our little one loves to keep moving. I bought myself (5ft1in) a yoga ball for my height. My husband always complained about it because it would always hurt his back and knees (6ft2in). So I hopped on amazon and made this purchase for his own yoga ball. My husband loves it. It fits him perfectly for his height and weight. Now my husband and little one can bounce away on the yoga ball. And this gives me an excuse when our little one is older to get my husband into yoga lol
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: If you’re searching for a great Exercise Ball... Look no more! THIS IS IT,
customer_reviews.text: While recovering from a really bad fall where I suffered multiple neck and back fractures, this amazing exercise ball has been my main course of therapy to regain my core strength, balance, posture, and stability. As a bonus, I’m also experiencing an awesome sense of well being! A huge plus to all this is their Customer Service! I would give them 10 stars if I could! Tim DePuy, CEO stands 100% behind his products, eager to help and making sure to answer your every question in a professional and pleasant manner. Susana Hendrick
customer_reviews.author: Valeria M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this exercise ball! unfortunately, it came without the actual measuring tape to let me know how much to inflate it to. I contacted the seller and am waiting for a response. I love that this product is made in the USA!! So hard to find American made products anymore! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin Althoff

customer_reviews.title: This is a first class product.
customer_reviews.text: It is better than the balls I use in my fitness club. It comes with an excellent pump and a measuring strap for proper inflation. One thing to know - the ball may have to rest partially inflated overnight to allow full inflation. The support folk at SmarterLife were very helpful. I measured after a month and the ball was still fully inflated. I sit on to watch TV and to use the computer in my downstairs office. I also bring home exercises from the health club - I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Perryaire

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my chair since working from home is killing my posture. Took a cpl days to inflate and if you like it firm you'll have to pump more air into it every cpl days (or maybe this is the way it is with every ball and I don't know) All in all I love it! Color just as it appears :)
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Larger than the 45 cm ball at my PT
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to do my Physical Therapy exercises at home, but even though I used the included tape and followed instructions to the letter, it has turned out quite a bit larger than the 45 ball at my Physical Therapist's. Otherwise, it's sturdy and fine. Just too big to do some of my exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee Danvers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer to inflate than I had hoped.. felt like it took forever to fill, and then I still had to put more air in it within a week because it wasn’t firm enough. However, the ball itself is perfect for my yoga and exercises as I needed it for and the color was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie O

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ball with this company. It doesn't smell bad, came well packaged and on time and they seller gives an email with additional info from how to properly blow up the ball to how to use to even a nice info/book download on diet, exercise and goals. Very nice esp for the price paid. I love the variety of colors, I chose black. Def would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: This stability ball was given to my mother that has a back problem. Physical therapists recommended that she use a ball. This is the one I purchased for her. You must follow the instructions to inflate and you will not have a problem. She has had no problems using the ball for the exercises the therapists recommended. I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: No Stink, No Stick!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. My wife and I are fragrance sensitive so we were looking for a ball that did not smell of chemicals. We also heard stories of some of the balls becoming sticky. We found the SmarterLife Products and ordered it. It arrived in short time. The material of the ball was much thicker than I had anticipated so it is very strong. It did not stink and you can clean it without the fear of the ball getting sticky! Great feedback from seller making sure we were satisfied. Can you believe that! WOW! Impressive. I am so very pleased with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Technical Bob

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is huge. It uses the tape to use as inflation guide. I didn’t think it was possible. I filled it up to 3rd Pic then l let it sit for 24 hours. Then filled it the rest. Very firm. I could probably let some air out. Definitely go smaller it you don’t want a big one. I’m 5’6 for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Brawny Balls
customer_reviews.text: Good product and great customer service. I bought two balls — 55cm & 75cm. It takes quite a lot of pumping to fill them up, but at least the supplied hand pump pushes air in on both the in and out strokes. They seem to be tough enough. I’m 200 lbs and am using the 75cm ball as a desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: MFA

customer_reviews.title: Holds My Fat A**
customer_reviews.text: Needed a solution for my bad back, sitting at my desk for work. This ball holds my 260 lb. fat a** just fine. Inflates way bigger than I need, I had to deflate it partway to get it low enough to sit on for my desk. Still holds me up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Timay

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, but I should have bought the smaller size. I bought the size for 5’4” and up, but am barely that tall and my legs are on the short side so it is awkward at times. Also, I lost patience with the hand pump and used an electric pump I keep for pool rafts, and that was a breeze. I plan on buying the smaller size eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Un-Inflatable
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works or not. Pump was not able to inflate. It continuously gets stuck while trying to push air through. This allows air to escape while trying to inflate. Followed directions and had 3 different people attempt to inflate. No luck. Did not try to return because Covid so don't want to go to the ups store right now 🤷
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality durable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality durable, and non-slip material that does have a propensity to attract dust similar to a static charge. Non-weighted so it goes where it wants very easily. Great inflation guide strap, but the pump is a complete upper body workout all in its self. The pump did fail partially thru the inflation process and I had to use a electric pump. I was able to salvege the pump and if the ball looses air (has not in over 10-days now) it will suffice to maintain pressure. A great device for yor home gym if you have the space. The ball provides a vast variety of economy exercises to work all areas of your body.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this purchase. I was overwhelmed at first with the choices available on Amazon and for the most part they all looked the same. I'm glad that I went with this ball. The size/height reference chart in the product description was extremely helpful and based on my purchase, accurate as well. The pump included worked well and it was easy to place the stopper in. The ball itself seems very durable. My golden retriever tried to claim the ball as hers. I'm currently sporting bruises from the depth of her scratches from getting between her and the ball...yet the ball has no marks from her attack. The included exercise chart is really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: jwise406

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold shape firmly during use, like a therapy ball
customer_reviews.text: When completely inflated, the 55cm is smaller than other fully inflated therapy balls. My physical therapist suggested I go this Theraband and since it was double the price, I went with this one. This one is more plyable and not as strong as the material used in actual physical therapy balls. I’d suggest Theraband over this one for firmness, holding shape and measuring body size properly. Otherwise, for just regular exercise, this one is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Nice exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball was exactly what they advertised. It had a nice little hand pump and several pins to close it with (extras for later). It even had a measuring tape so you know when to stop pumping it. The material is nice and sturdy. I am very pleased and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F Allen

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I only received the ball I didn't get any of the stuff that was included. *Update* I company reached out and corrected this right away. I'm am very pleased with how they handled the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swiss ball of high quality, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to use when my exercises were handed to me requiring the use of a Swiss ball. This is one of the few ads that shows what size is appropriate for your height. I bought the max size and it seems rather large, but that makes it more challenging to do to the exercises, and you will get more out of them buying the right size. The ball seems to be high quality. There are zero instructions, but I figured out myself how the pump connects and how to use the white plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Too Tall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully inflate and loses air fast
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I purchased it to use as a chair to work from home, no more than a few hours a day of usage. The inflation instructions were confusing but I followed them as best as I could. It is impossible to inflate the ball nearly as much as the black tape suggests is possible. The best I could do still had 8 inches of overlapping tape. It also loses air after a few hours of use. I can tell because I use it while sitting at a desk, and my arm position changes. This is getting returned as soon as my real chair arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin V.

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered. I wanted 75. I get 55. Have a tape measure, The tape that comes in the box doesn’t have numbers, so they want you to think the ball will be inflated as big as the tape. Well I got the 75cm tape, but a 55cm ball .. it didn’t fit the tape measure they send in the box
customer_reviews.author: S. Anand

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, timely arrival, and VIP email.
customer_reviews.text: This exercise ball is amazing and helps me greatly in easing my back pain during pregnancy. My family loves it as we have fun and keep fit with them. The company itself is superb. They personally sent me an email to know follow up on the order I made and how I felt about their product. That was so thoughtful of them. I am really impressed with the quality of this wonderful exercise ball and would highly highly highly recommend it to anyone. The shipping was quick and it arrived on time. That is very important to me. I am proud to give them 5 star and would love to give them more as they really exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: cajo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: At first we had an issue filling the ball with air but once I contacted customer service they immediately rectified my issue and I had a new pump delivered to me within 2 days. With the new pump filling the ball only took 15 minutes and I love the product. Antislip and really good quality. Helps my lower back and I plan to use it during labor ! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita Singh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My 55 cm ball came with a pump that was clearly defective. Although I eventually managed to inflate the ball to the 80% level, it was extremely difficult because the pump would constantly bind up, and had to be "coaxed" into working again. I contacted SmarterLife by email, and they immediately sent me a replacement pump that arrived within a couple of days. Excellent customer service! The new pump worked fine and i was quickly able to inflate the ball to the size specified by the tape measure. I haven't really used the ball yet, but it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball to use during my pregnancy and birth. It works great! Helps relief tailbone pain and back pressure. My husband even used it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for back rehab
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues, including bulging and ruptured disks. During my last episode of severe back pain, where I was pretty much helpless, this ball helped me so much!! At first, I would just drape over the ball laying on my stomach to give me some relief. I did not fill it up completely with air so it would 'give'. What a relief!!! Then I started to rock back and forth while laying on it on my stomach. Great therapy for my lower back, could not have done it without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa CoreyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Doctor
customer_reviews.text: Exercise ball was recommended to me by doctor of physical therapy. I have many back problems due to osteoarthritis and with the exercises given to me during PT I can continue to strengthen my core muscles after PT sessions are done. Had to borrow electric air pump from brother-in-law to inflate the ball due to arthritis in hands and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Included Airpump broke before I finished airing it up
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea behind the size band, but it doesn't do much good when the included air pump breaks just as you are nearing the end of the pumping process. The ball is firm, but certainly not the 65 cm's it needs to be, and the air pump is both letting air out, and will not pump air into it. I will have to get a different pump to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: tjack

customer_reviews.title: Did not inflate enough for proper support and stability.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used stability balls in the past at the gym and with a personal trainer. They’re great when properly inflated! This time I purchased for pregnancy support and unfortunately this ball will not fully inflate to a size that ergonomically supports my hips being higher than my knees when sitting. It’s doesn’t feel stable or supportive. We followed the directions clearly and waited to fully inflate over multiple tries. The air is just no getting in well. My 7 year old daughter loves rolling around on her belly though so we’re keeping it for her, but I can’t recommend this ball for pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Too thin. Not a birthing ball.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin. I suspected this ball was too thin. I purchased it hoping to use it as a birthing ball. I went to my Lamaze class today for the second time and I brought this call to compare it with others in the class. The teacher suggested this ball wasn’t going to do the job so now I’ll be getting a different ball.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: The ball, which I bought to use as a desk "chair," was too high for my 5'3" frame and also after sitting on it for awhile, my rear end started to feel numb. At first it felt bouncy and sort of comfortable, but after awhile it was too hard. I think I'll try and see if a taller friend wants it, unless the seller would agree to take it back.
customer_reviews.author: potterbaby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!  Sit on it everyday at work
customer_reviews.text: My original desk chair was causing major pain for me. I talked to my trainer and she said using a ball would help my posture, core and over all health. While I sit here, I do stretches and other ball exercises. Constantly moving!! It was so easy to blow up too! No weird odors!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Not perfectly round
customer_reviews.text: The ball is not perfectly round, it's kinda oval shaped. The pump is not the best and after certain point the air starts leaking while you're pumping. You then have to pump faster so that the air going in is more than the air leaking. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: kritikos

customer_reviews.title: My 4 other kids liked it so much too
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son has sensory processing disorder and LOVES this therapy ball! He bounces on it watching a TV show, lays on it while reading a book! My 4 other kids liked it so much too, I decided to order another one, and it can't come soon enough! Highly recommend this product! Appears durable, easy to inflate with the included air pump!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Weink

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate properly and so stable!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to inflate. I've had one of these before that I believe I had overinflated and didn't realise it! It was super unstable. This one is so stable!! These guys included an easy to use measurement guide for no extra charge that helped me inflate my ball to the correct dimensions for my body weight! Now, I use it everyday to do my core exercises I need to do without killing my back!
customer_reviews.author: tallen7

customer_reviews.title: The company was quick to email me and ask if I had received the ball and if I liked it. I told them about the issues and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first exercise ball. I bought it to sit at while working at my desk. I had a somewhat challenging time inflating it at first. I was unfamiliar with exercise balls and was afraid of over inflating. The company was quick to email me and ask if I had received the ball and if I liked it. I told them about the issues and they offered helpful suggestions. Now the ball is much larger and properly inflated. They alleviated all of my fears. I suggest this ball and company if youre looking to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent vendor
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these balls for home exercises (led by our usual trainer via FaceTime, during the coronavirus pandemic). They were easy to inflate (with the pump enclosed with each one). They are strong and attractive. We’re very happy with them and their seller.
customer_reviews.author: P. SHAVER

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO SMALL. 75cm. Did i get wrong ball
customer_reviews.text: 75 cm is way to small. I love that its non toxic and appreciate that there's no odor. But I'm 6 foot 4 and my last 75 cm ball was 40 percent bigger than the one I just received. It's fully pumped. So can't really use it . WAY TO SMALL. Not sure if I got the wrong ball in the 75cm package
customer_reviews.author: reed

customer_reviews.title: Use the information provided for correct use
customer_reviews.text: This ball provides excellent pain relief for the lower back pain, if used regularly per instructions. It also improves back stability and posture.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycardinal

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The rating ask for pain relief? I had to give her the three as a neutral mark, because I wasn't using it for pain relief. I'm using it for different exercises that I do at physical therapy. For that, it's working just as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Stv

customer_reviews.title: Trust the tape!
customer_reviews.text: It's great, trust the tape included. I thought the ball was the wrong size and wouldn't go this big, but it did. Comfortable and a nice color. Thanks to the company for following up with me on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sitabai

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I absolutely love stability balls, as I find certain exercise are easier such as crunches and and arm exercises (where your head and shoulder rest on the ball with your knees bent 90 degrees and feet flat so that torso is parallel to floor; this also engages your core). I purchased the medium size ball as a replacement for another brand I've had for over 10 years. I can already tell I will like this one better; for one thing it isn't as smooth which makes it easier to not slide off. Additionally, I am utilizing it as a chair when I sit at the table to type on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: TJsMom

customer_reviews.title: Magic for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Currently using for pregnancy stuff. Soon will be using for labor stuff. Then later will be using for exercise. I can’t believe how nice it feels sitting on this ball, feels great on hips and back (38 weeks pregnant) can’t believe I waited this long to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: GraceL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball for a doula and her clients!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a professional Birth Doula, it was very important to me to find a "birthing ball" that could support the weight of my pregnant clients. They are very special women and it is my job to make sure they are as comfortable and secure as possible during labor. I bought the purple (medium) ball because I figured it would work for my shorter and taller clients, and it works like a charm! I am VERY confident having my clients labor on this ball and will be recommending the product to other doulas in my network. I reviewed MANY exercise balls before choosing this one, and I assure you, you will not find a ball with a better rating and guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Moses

customer_reviews.title: I like the ball
customer_reviews.text: I like the ball, it feels sturdy. I followed the recommended chart for height and I feel like the ball is too big for some of the exercises I would like to do. If this one holds up, I will probably order a smaller one from this company in the future. They are also quite pleasant to work with. They did tell me I could return the ball for a smaller one. I choose to keep it, ottoman, extra seating, etc. great color too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a long time to pump and there was extra material all over the ball
customer_reviews.text: Like the product so far. The tape they give you to measure isn’t what I was expecting- you’re supposed to know it’s fully inflated when it lays flat on the ball but there’s a lot of extra tape on the floor. The pump is nice because it’s not electric but it took me 17 minutes to pump mine up. The color is true to the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works that core!
customer_reviews.text: Great directions for inflating are included and visual exercise instructions also. I bought this ball to perform exercises prescribed by my DPT but I also do the ones that came with the ball. Works great on improving core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Just Fine!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it! We carefully used compressed air to blow it up (even though you are not supposed to) but followed all other directions and worked very well. I got the large size, I use it in my home office. I am 5’11” and only my toes and the balls of my feet touch the ground. Lost a tiny bit of air over a month. Has done wonders for my back, much easier to sit with good posture!
customer_reviews.author: IdahoWoman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This ball is very sturdy and made well. I love stretching my back with it. I like that it came with the pump to fill the ball. It was a little challenging to fill it up. It would have been easier with a second person.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: The ball is made of thicker sturdy material. It has a bit of grip to it as well so you don’t slide off easily. It’s been working great as an alternative desk chair and workout tool. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ThrowStuff

product_meta.title: SmarterLife Exercise Ball for Yoga, Balance, Stability - Fitness, Pilates, Birthing, Therapy, Office Ball Chair, Classroom Flexible Seating - Anti Burst, No Slip, Workout Guide
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE HOME GYM EQUIPMENT FOR VARIETY OF FUNCTIONS: Use our exercise balls for a wide array of active exercises such as yoga, Pilates, or CrossFit to tone muscles, increase cardio endurance, build strength, and control weight. The versatility of our therapy ball stretches beyond exercise into activities such as correcting posture, ab development, play therapy, sitting at a desk, labor support during pregnancy and birthing. Add a base and resistance bands for the ultimate resistance workout.

NO POP WITH HIGH ANTI-BURST RATING FOR MAXIMUM SAFETY YOU CAN LEAN ON: We don’t call our Exercise Ball a stability ball for nothing. With an ultra-high anti-burst rating of 2000 lbs, it doesn’t pop like a balloon when punctured by sharp objects which is what happens with a lower-rated swiss ball. Instead, it slowly deflates and protects you from injury during vigorous exercise or while using it as an office chair.

NO DROP WITH ANTI-SLIP MATTE SURFACE FOR A SECURE GRIP: Whether you’re using it as a gym ball, physio ball, yoga ball, swiss ball, therapy ball, sitting ball, pregancy ball or a general fitness ball, you’ll enjoy lying on, bouncing, rolling, or lifting it. Its tactile lines blend with the smooth, hypoallergenic surface to provide comfortable, non-slip contact with your skin without the sticky feel.

EVEN, ALL-AROUND THICKNESS RETAINS SHAPE BETTER THROUGH TIME: The higher the anti-burst rating, the thicker the casing to create a greater resistance to punctures and to prevent air from seeping through the surface. It makes a perfect balance ball with its sturdy 0.2 cm PVC casing that stretches evenly across the ball surface, maintaining its shape longer and preventing it from rolling away.

CHOICE OF 45 CM, 55 CM, 65 CM AND 75 CM SIZES TO SUIT YOUR HEIGHT: Whether you use the ball for exercise or as a desk chair or office furniture, our sizing chart can help you find the ideal ball size to ensure safety and comfort when you use it. INCLUDED IN THE BOX: 1) Premium Exercise Ball 2 ) High Quality Hand Pump 3) Exact Diameter Measuring Tape 4) 2 Ball Plugs 5) Ball Plug Removal Tool 6) Exercise Guide and 7) Bonus eBook "The 7 Secrets To Your Ideal Body" (emailed to you after purchase)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
